message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You rejected the 50/50 split, so I'll try to get more!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but not that much!
You're still not giving me enough, I'll take a bigger share this time!
You're pushing for a bigger share, but I'm not going to give in that easily!
You're not budging, so I'll take the biggest share I can get now!
I'm taking a stand and demanding a bigger share. You can either accept or risk losing even more!
You're trying to strong-arm me, but I'll take what I can get now!
I'm giving up, take it all if you want it. I'll just be happy to get something.
